General.Name: S Split Corp
General.Description: Mulvihill S Split Corp. is a closed ended equity mutual fund launched by Mulvihill Fund Services Inc. The fund is managed by Mulvihill Capital Management Inc. It invests in the public equity markets of Canada. The fund also invests some portion of its portfolio in derivative instruments. It invests in the stocks companies operating in financial sector. It invests in the stocks of The Bank of Nova Scotia. Mulvihill S Split Corp. was formed on January 26, 2007 and is domiciled in Canada.
General.Address: 121 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3T9
